title: Hail Mary = Je Vous salue Marie
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, Television Romande, Channel 4 and Jean-Luc Godard
brief_description: This amazingly moving, funny yet disturbing, richly human film has aroused passionate feelings right around the world. Mary, the young daughter of a petrol station owner who is just beginning to discover womanhood, and her taxi driver, Joseph, try to grapple with her unexplained pregnancy.
